channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Index Research for LA7, 4 April 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Movimento 5 Stelle (EFDD): 18.4–24.1%
  • Partito Democratico (S&D): 18.1–23.7%
  • Lega Nord (ENF): 30.4–37.0%
  • Forza Italia (EPP): 7.4–11.5%
  • Fratelli d’Italia (ECR): 3.4–6.3%
  • Liberi e Uguali (S&D): 2.2–4.7%
  • Più Europa (ALDE): 1.8–4.1%
  • Potere al Popolo (GUE/NGL): 0.9–2.6%
